Englih

Hunting season  is coming! Grab a  gun and hit the backwoods of the noble forest  venison! Four hunting games  allow you to hunt hares,  pheasants, foxes and  wild boars in a detailed,  fully 3D, and the  wild ducks and other  birds in the professional  photographic locations that  will inspire you with its natural  beauty! But be careful  - forest fire will ensure that you respect the right of strict hunting!  Wild animals surprise you with unexpected behavior and  accurate representation of the appearance and movements, and  special facilities will allow the system to adapt the game to thy own personal requirements!

Features:
- four games in one!
- Highly detailed wildlife
- a realistic model of the movements and behavior
- photographic scenery and full 3D
- Attractive bonus system
- set the speed of animals, the angle of the shot, etc.
- good gameplay and attractive simulation
